cz.ive.genius
Class PhantomKeeper

java.lang.Object
  cz.ive.genius.PhantomKeeper
All Implemented Interfaces:
Listener, java.io.Serializable
public class PhantomKeeper
extends java.lang.Object
implements Listener, java.io.Serializable

This class offers methods for keeping phantoms updated. It tries not to duplicate passiveUpdateQuerries and to unregister them when not needed.

Author:
Ondra
See Also:

changed

public void changed(Hook initiator)
Some of the sources have changed. We must unregister a register old and new phantoms.

Specified by:
changed in interface Listener
Parameters:
initiator - origin of message

canceled

public void canceled(Hook initiator)
Description copied from interface: Listener
Signals cancel of the hook. The hook we are listening was deleted and will signalize nothing more.

Specified by:
canceled in interface Listener
